description: Size of sea of composite numbers surrounding n-th prime.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
formula: a(n) = A031131(n) - 2 for n > 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 19 2013
mathematica: Table[ Prime[n + 2] - Prime[n] - 2, {n, 75}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ Oct 27 2004 *)Join[{1},#[[3]]-#[[1]]-2&/@Partition[Prime[Range[90]],3,1]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 26 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a046930 1 = 1a046930 n = subtract 2 $ a031131 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 19 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Marc LeBrun_
extensions: More terms from Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org)
